results.title: [Effect of renshen jianxin capsule for alleviating insulin resistance in patients with coronary heart disease and glucose tolerance impairment].
results.journal: Zhongguo Zhong Xi Yi Jie He Za Zhi
results.text_hl: METHODS: Eighty @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Coronary_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D003327 @@@CHD@@@-@DISEASE_Glucose_Intolerance @DISEASE_MESH:D018149 @@@GTI@@@ of qi-deficiency @<m>DISEASE_Postthrombotic_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D054070 @@@blood-stasis syndrome@@@ were randomly assigned to 2 groups equally, the treated group was treated by RJC and the control group by @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, based on the conventional Western medical treatment with nitric esters for 20 weeks.
